mapper.sql: id, designer_id, name, brief, type, create_time, update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: select a.id as id , a.designer_id as designerId, a.name as name, a.brief as brief, a.type as type , a.create_time as createTime, b.img_url as coverPictureUrl from t_design a LEFT JOIN t_design_img b on a.id = b.design_id where a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and b.img_type = 1 and a.designer_id =#{designerId} order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_design (designer_id, name, brief, type, create_time) values (#{designerId}, #{name}, #{brief}, #{type}, #{createTime})
